::Slayer/Ramulus/Proto/Smokescreen::

Slayer nods as he recieves Prebon's orders, spinning around and firing a few 
shots at Lunarpine as the bot jumps at him off of the tree.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus sees two missiles fly out of nowhere, followed by some chips. He 
swears.

"Maximals, stay clear of the chips," he says, jumping when a huge rattle 
collapsing sound sounded near him. He spins around, his eyes widening when he 
sees the Ark collapse in a clowd of dust. The dust clears, revealing nothing 
more than a pile of metal, charred and bent. Ramulus looks at it in horror, 
expecting to dissapear due to a time rip.

But nothing happened. The forest and heap of metal and Ramulus remained there 
as before, with no new feeling but a slight feel of relief in Ramulus. He 
exhales, realizing he had been holding his breath. Thank the Matrix Blue 
Stinger had taken the Autobots out of the Ark..

He turns back to where he thought Tamtron was, firing a few shots at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing two missiles come out of nowhere, Proto aims his rifle, firing at the 
place where the two missiles had emerged from.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen jumps out of the way of a missile, the explosion sending him 
flying through a tree and falling onto the ground.
